41#ifndef HB_NO_VISIBILITY
42
43uint64_t const _hb_NullPool[(HB_NULL_POOL_SIZE + sizeof (uint64_t) - 1) / sizeof (uint64_t)] = {};
44/*thread_local*/ uint64_t _hb_CrapPool[(HB_NULL_POOL_SIZE + sizeof (uint64_t) - 1) / sizeof (uint64_t)] = {};
45
46DEFINE_NULL_NAMESPACE_BYTES (OT, Index) = {0xFF,0xFF};
47DEFINE_NULL_NAMESPACE_BYTES (OT, VarIdx) = {0xFF,0xFF,0xFF,0xFF};
48DEFINE_NULL_NAMESPACE_BYTES (OT, LangSys) = {0x00,0x00, 0xFF,0xFF, 0x00,0x00};
49DEFINE_NULL_NAMESPACE_BYTES (OT, RangeRecord) = {0x01};
50DEFINE_NULL_NAMESPACE_BYTES (OT, ClipRecord) = {0x01};
51DEFINE_NULL_NAMESPACE_BYTES (OT, CmapSubtableLongGroup) = {0x00,0x00,0x00,0x01, 0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00, 0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00};
52DEFINE_NULL_NAMESPACE_BYTES (AAT, SettingName) = {0xFF,0xFF, 0xFF,0xFF};
53DEFINE_NULL_NAMESPACE_BYTES (AAT, Lookup) = {0xFF,0xFF};

55
56/* hb_map_t */
57
58const hb_codepoint_t minus_1 = -1;
59
60/* hb_face_t */
61
62#ifndef HB_NO_BEYOND_64K
63static inline unsigned
64load_num_glyphs_from_loca (const hb_face_t *face)
65{
66 unsigned ret = 0;
67
68 unsigned indexToLocFormat = face->table.head->indexToLocFormat;
69
70 if (indexToLocFormat <= 1)
71 {
72 bool short_offset = 0 == indexToLocFormat;
73 hb_blob_t *loca_blob = face->table.loca.get_blob ();
74 ret = hb_max (1u, loca_blob->length / (short_offset ? 2 : 4)) - 1;
75 }
76
77 return ret;
78}
79#endif
80
81static inline unsigned
82load_num_glyphs_from_maxp (const hb_face_t *face)
83{
84 return face->table.maxp->get_num_glyphs ();
85}
86
87unsigned int
88hb_face_t::load_num_glyphs () const
89{
90 unsigned ret = 0;
91
92#ifndef HB_NO_BEYOND_64K
93 ret = hb_max (ret, load_num_glyphs_from_loca (this));
94#endif
95
96 ret = hb_max (ret, load_num_glyphs_from_maxp (face: this));
97
98 num_glyphs = ret;
99 return ret;
100}
101
102unsigned int
103hb_face_t::load_upem () const
104{
105 unsigned int ret = table.head->get_upem ();
106 upem = ret;
107 return ret;
108}
109
110
111#endif
